name: Kunoichi 2: Fall of the Shrinemaiden
summary: The fiends continue their rampage across Tokyo City and the beautiful Shrinemaiden Momiji must take a stand! Seeking to avenge her clan she enters the hellish cityscape , but what new terrors will she find lurking within? As she tangles with foes both human and demonic, can the innocent Shrinemaiden retain her purity?.
